Group B streptococcus ( GBS ; streptococcus agalactiae ) gram positive coccus frequently colonize human genital tract . In pregnant woman , GBS cause urinary tract infection , chorioamnionitis , postpartum endometritis . Newborn infant also acquire GBS infection passage vagina . Early onset GBS disease newborn lead pneumonia , meningitis , sepsis , life-threatening . Early onset GBS disease become rare since widespread use GBS screen prophylactic treatment pregnant woman . The relationship early onset GBS disease sweep membrane know . DOC.brief_title: Membrane Sweeping Group B Streptococcus ( GBS ) Positive Patients
